website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and well-made preschooler backpack that has several features that are useful for parents and kids. It even sports a clip for attaching other Urban Infant accessories.
pros: Distances itself from competitors for the side "art tube" designed for safely stashing rolled-up artwork
Made of tough material with a waterproof laminated finish that's easy to clean
Size is perfect for ages 2 to 7 years
Available in a collection of fun prints
cons: Top handle is prone to fraying, but otherwise, the construction is durable
Some parents find that some folders are too tall to fit inside

customer_reviews.title: Love this for a tot!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a small tot. My daughter is 2 1/2 and loves this back pack. We also purchased the attachable lunch box. I purchased this for her to use as a small carry-on for travel, but I'm finding that we use it much more frequently. It replaces a diaper bag or tote. I can use a small purse again for me and then we carry the things she needs in this. Large, easy pull zipper makes it easy for her to open and close on her own. Great size for a small tot to carry as long as you don't overpack toys, etc. (watch the weight). Keeps her busy when we're out. She loves packing and unpacking it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Better than other backpack brand!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was hesitant to get a 2nd backpack for my toddler... BUT it was a perfect match to her nap mat and it was 20% off. Once I received it, I was impressed by the sturdiness and quality of it. And after seeing how easy my 3 year old carries it, I’m in love. The straps don’t fall off her shoulders and the zipper is perfect for her little hands. Much better than her Pottery Barn Kids backpack. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mel S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 15 month old
customer_reviews.text: The baby got real jealous of her older sister having a backpack so I came across this too-cute pack. My baby can put it on, walk around with it. When she gets a bit older or when I get around to teaching her things, the chunky zipper could easily be used by her. It is some type of real nice thick waterproof material. Type of backpack that if your young one comes across a puddle of water filled with tadpoles and uses their backpack as a mobile aquarium to take their new pets home and then forgets about it, you can easily hose it out. The violet/princess one is too cute
customer_reviews.author: C & K Ram

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this toddler backpack. We also got the matching lunch box. My daughter loves and the daycare does too. The clips help keep everything together and the name labels inside help make sure all of my daughters stuff returns home with her. Our favorite part about it is the art and papers pocket. There’s a compartment for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Very practical.
customer_reviews.text: We love this backpack! It's the perfect size for our daughter who just started daycare. It's a little small to fit all of her stuff in, so we might consider at some point getting her the roll up cot cover thing so that way we don't have to use up all of the space of her backpack for her blanket and crib sheet. What has been more helpful that I thought was the side sleeve for art work whatnot. The kids do a lot crafting so it's nice that there's a safe space where it won't get smashed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a change of clothes
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it was going to be big for my 18 months old but I was wrong. Perfect size for a change of clothes, some diapers, wipes and a zippy cup. The print is nice (I got it in the Seattle) and the material seems sturdy. My son seems to be quite happy leaving the house carrying his own bag (like Mom and Dad!) :-)
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit folder
customer_reviews.text: I loved this backpack! But had to return it--it doesn't fit a regular-sized folder? Our preschool sends a folder home every day with info/kids' artwork, I can't imagine they are the only school that uses folders like this. Surprised and disappointed that it missed the mark, otherwise very pretty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tweevie

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use & stands the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted 3 full school years. Ordered this as a replacement only bc my daughter was starting at a new school. The art holder (tube shaped) does not fit water bottles, but there’s a mesh pocket on the other side that does. More pockets on the inside would be my only thought for design consideration in the future. They have matching nap mats & lunch boxes that clip to this back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: A company that stands by their product!
customer_reviews.text: This company really stands by their product. I bought this backpack for my 2 yr old to start daycare. The top hook strap started to come apart from the bag. I sent the company pictures and they sent me a new bag within days... free of charge! Its the perfect size for a toddler and has just enough room for a few diapers, change of clothes, sunscreen and a cup pouch on the side. I love the larger roll up pouch where she can put her artwork from school. The zipper pull is bigger than a normal size zipper which is great for little hands to zip and unzip their own bag.
customer_reviews.author: Railroadvixion

customer_reviews.title: Delightful fabric covers a functional design!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is functional & fun! Super cute submarine material makes it standout from the usual prince(ss) themed options out there. It’s made tiny for tiny hands and a tiny body. We’ve even fit an older model nebulizer machine in it! The fabric is durable & easy to wipe off. It arrived with a cute chalkboard sign for those IG school picture days! I’d buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Skyes

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and colorful.  The side sleeve for papers is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoys this backpack. It is big enough to fit different items for the day and the side sleeve for papers is a nice feature to have. The material is not like a normal backpack and has a water resistant feel, though not like cheap plastic. The zipper is a nice feature as it is large. It seems well made so I don't foresee the straps breaking.
customer_reviews.author: SummerBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I bought two of these bags for my twins Christmas gifts and I love them. They are so cute and the perfect size for them to take to daycare BUT one of them came with a “first day of school” plaque to write on each year for pictures and one didn’t.....not sure why but now I’m bummed I only have one! Other than that they are great!
customer_reviews.author: aheb

customer_reviews.title: Great with the Lunch Box and Bedding!
customer_reviews.text: After six months of M-F school use by my 3.5 year old, this thing still looks brand new. The lunchbox does, too. Crazy durable, easy to clean, and right sized for my toddler, we couldn’t love it more. My son’s teachers and fellow parents were so impressed with the Urban Infant system that it started a trend within the school. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT size for my 14 month old. It will be a good size for her for at least another year. There is not a ton of space, but if you want your LO to have independence & carry their own belongings, then this is the backpack you should get! I love the tube thing on the side for holding paper and the clips that we can attach our matching lunch bag to! Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 13mo old when she was transitioning into the toddler room at daycare and she LOVES it. She wears it (empty) all over the house, and enjoys filling it up and emptying it out. It's the perfect size for a toddler. It fits all of her school items easily (cups, containers, lunch, clothes, etc.) and has a special side pocket for her artwork. We love that it matches her cot blanket as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare! 💖
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a backpack for my infant daughter to use for daycare. All the teachers asked where I got this bag, such a smart and delightfully cute pack. Can fit up to 8 full size 9-oz Avent bottles. The artwork tube is perfect for her daily logs and projects. Plus the material is easy to wipe clean. I also bought the matching lunchbox pack, great for her dirty bibs/clothes at the end of each day.
customer_reviews.author: VeronikaOMarrero

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag, I can put my daughter’s diapers, her foldable potty seat, drink, snacks and extra pair of clothes in it and it’s not too heavy for her to carry, she carries it wherever she goes and is so proud to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Dauz

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my granddaughter who is 20 mos. old. It is absolutely adorable and just the perfect size for her to wear on her back. She loves and it and feels like a BIG girl when we put it on. She uses it for daycare and caring her sippy cups and lovey!!! Even the teacher said how adorable it is. Very stylish for a toddler and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DSBryant

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Here's why: 1. Easy to clean material. 2. Really cute Superhero theme. Great for my dude who is loving superheroes. 3. Perfect size for toddlers to wear without it being too big! We also have the matching nap mat. Love that too!
customer_reviews.author: Melany C.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute bag, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Thisnis a very cute little backpack. Made of a water resistant tabernacle so it wont likely stain very easy. The little pancil carrier pouch accessorie it perfect to hold crayons and whatnot. My two year old daughter loves her new backpack, and is rediculously cute when wearing it. Also, urban infant provides some too notch customer support. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Super waterproof! But lacks sizable pockets
customer_reviews.text: This pack was smaller than expected but works for preschool and light enough for her to carry easily. I do wish it had more outside pockets or at least that the one that is there was stretchier to fit a water bottle easily. But it is very waterproof, not just “water resistant”. No water soaked into fabric which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: liz leighton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!! So cute
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the cutest little backpack ever. Bought for my 2-year old for a trip up north...she didn’t really want to wear it, but I’m sure that will change over time. Material is great for spills since it’s moisture-wicking essentially. She’s not in school yet so I used the little art pocket thingie for fruit snacks and her lovey!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Style and quality
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: 1/8/2018 Customer service is great! We had a small problem and they resolved it within 3 days! REVIEW: - The design/print is wonderful! We really love it and get lots of compliments. - Very easy to clean; a sitter wrote our daughters name on the outside of it in sharpie; and I was able to scrub it off. It generally looks as good as day 1. - The zipper is large and works very well; dont take that for granted.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: A great product with a unique print. I was looking for a book bag for my toddler that would hold up and not look like everyone’s else. This is the perfect sizes for a 4 year old. We have the matching lunch bag and nap pad. Will recommend to all my mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very light, sturdy and URBAN
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Bought it together with the tot cot. My kid loves it and always wanna wear to and from school. Too bad during these pandemic days, as school's closed, she just wears it at home. I love the tube, very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: I love the print , too small for daycare or school. the size is great for like a day trip and if it didn't have the extra side pocket which makes it feel odd. The material is ok, I did notice it attracts dirt, dust and pet hair, its not a backpack to be left on the floor. I would love it is they had it in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: P.Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for a tot
customer_reviews.text: Caveat - I’ve not given this to my toddler yet (waiting for Christmas). It’s just the right size and lightweight. It appears to be easy to clean and I love that it comes with a spot to roll and store all the wonderful artwork she bring home from school/daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Fliberty-jibet

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit a folder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's first day of Pre-K because I was completely sold by the attached tube for her large paper projects. Unfortunately, it does not fit a regular sized folder without having to bend each top edge of the folder significantly. I was extremely disappointed. If folder space is needed, then purchase something else. I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing bag. I ordered the Urban Infant "Bulkie" last ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bag. I ordered the Urban Infant "Bulkie" last year for my son and wanted a similar bag for my daughter now that she is older. The bulkie isn't available anymore but, when I ran across this I was even more excited. My daughter is only 21 months and this is the perfect size. I can definitely see her carrying it for the next couple of years. Wipeable surface is awesome and just enough room for toddler essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for my 1yo daughter because of its size and cute pattern, I didn’t realize that it would be more than I asked for. I love that the fabric is water resistant, and so easy to wipe down. The zipper is chunky and easy for her to open herself. And seems strong enough to handle her yanking on it. I love that it’s got a cart handle for me and adjustable straps for when she’s old enough to carry it herself. Overall I’ve been extremely satisfied with the product, and look forward to getting the attachable lunch bag when she’s old enough to need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ingels

customer_reviews.title: It is enough to get her through the day and is perfect size for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves her packie! She is able to wear it without a problem. We can fit a change of clothes, a pair of shoes, eight diapers, wipes, and sunscreen. It is enough to get her through the day and is perfect size for a toddler. We get so many compliments on the matching nap mat and backpack combo.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte R. ellise

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly for my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old granddaughter loved this backpack and modeled it for her mom!!! She takes it to daycare everyday!!! According to her mom it's easy to wipe and keep clean and can hold a lot of stuff!
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Effectively Functional and Aesthetically Cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 2yo niece...straps are a little wider compared to most toddler backpacks which challenges her putting it on independently but the width helps keep the straps in place. It is cute and becomes adorably cute when doned by the niestren.
customer_reviews.author: Serene

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but small. Check the size for the needs.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, just very small. I think it's best suited for 2 year olds, not 3+ or pre-K. You can't fit regular size folders or 8x11 papers in it. Unfortunately, folders don't roll up into the tube well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Lovely back pack for my 3 year old. Perfect size (could use up to 6 years old) adorable and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 yr old daughter and it's a perfect fit for her. The material is sturdy, well built, and easy to wipe/clean up any spills. The circular outside pocket is meant for rolling up artwork so it won't get damaged in transport - very thoughtful! My daughter loves her backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Boston mama

customer_reviews.title: Great first school backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had maybe one more pocket/compartment in the front. Other than that, this is the perfect size for my preschooler and the holder on the side is great for her artwork, which she brings home all the time, but also a BANANA to take to school!!
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! We have used this backpack for 2 school years and its still in great shape! The only wear & tear is the main zipper pull came off, but it’s easy to put on another. The cylindrical side compartment is great for artwork, and the clip on lunch box was a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne83

customer_reviews.title: Cute and VERY PRACTICAL
customer_reviews.text: I love the designs! I love how the straps have a nice cushion to them and are fitted so they don't bother my toddler. Its a great size for her and handles artwork, drinks and her changes of clothes for preschool! She LOVES her bag so much and we expect it will last for a couple years at least! I will be ordering her lunch pack that snaps on to it which not only is awesome but I am glad that i can build on feature of the backpack without taking additional inside space! Love this product and will order again for my youngest.
customer_reviews.author: Heavenly Blossoms

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the zipper. It is big enough so that my son will eventually be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Earnhardt

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality! Inside torn within a month! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is POOR quality, I bought it on her birthday which was in June, just so we can use it when her school starts. She’s 2 and half and she goes to half day 3 days a week, it is only barely December now, the bag was already torn inside back in October, and the white color foam looking thing was coming out. Outside was so easy to be stained but hard to wipe off nor cleaned. Either way, this is some bad quality stuff for that price. Please don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.author: M. Y. H.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t fit regular sized folders.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, My daughter and I love it. The only downside is that your folders will bend. had to find mini sized note books & have been folding her papers in half. Would have been nice if it was slightly taller in length, not width.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Aniciete

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! It is just the perfect size for my 3 year old and has plenty of room for all her preschool needs. I love the lunch box attachment you can buy with it that clips right on. We got the hot air balloon pattern and we absolutely love it. It's very well made and the material is awesome & is easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Caseylynn Seaver

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but useless
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but useless. I bought the whole set of urban infant items in Balloons for my godchild so that everything could match for preschool, but the one thing she needed was to have a folder in her backpack and the packie can't fit one! I understand that it has the tube on the side for papers but it would have been way more useful being two inches taller.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Daigneault

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this backpack! Perfect for my almost 3yo for daycare. Made from easy to clean material on the outside and inside. just received this still have to do an update review to see how well it holds up. Purchase the matching lunch box and so glad that I did! It has super cute clips that allow the lunch box to clip to the front of the backpack. I would definitely purchases again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Montano

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for toddler. Love matching options.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag for my toddler to bring to daycare. It fits everything he needs and he loves wearing it! I love the section on the side for his artwork. I also have the nap mat and love that it matches.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fir for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 2-3 year old. However, school will tell you to get a bigger bag because student’s jacket needs to be able to fit inside. Winter jacket will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute backpack but VERY small. It fits my daughters lunch box, that’s it. A normal sized sheet of paper/coloring book is too tall to zip inside. Also it’s more of a vinyl material, not cloth. Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Baby V's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Unique design. It’s a perfect size for toddlers. Spacious on the inside!
customer_reviews.author: ABBY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschool!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this backpack for my (then 20month old) daughter. She takes it to school with her everyday, and it serves its purpose. Not only that, but she loves to wear it. She’s a little over 2yo, and it fits her comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zipper gets stuck.
customer_reviews.text: This pack is adorable, and I would have given 5 stars but the zipper gets REALLY stuck constantly for no reason. It got stuck the very first time we zipped it open. My husband spent 25 minutes getting it to work, only to have it get stuck again and again. Returning, since this IS for a toddler and it needs to be functional. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Starr

customer_reviews.title: Cute backpack, but can't fit a full size folder.
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack. Feels very sturdy. However, my son gets a folder every Friday to tell us about his week and the backpack can't zip with it inside, without smashing the folder. If it was just another inch or so bigger, I would give it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Fits my 18 month old perfectly and love how the lunch box clips on the front. (Makes it easy for the people at Mother's Day out to keep his stuff together!) I want the whole set in this print! 💙
customer_reviews.author: A-Sys

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is great for a two year old
customer_reviews.text: Even two year old like to carry around their own things. A few books, stickers and a water bottle fit nicely. A great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Bosque

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the diminsions on this bag, it's super small! It's smaller than a piece of paper ha! But it is super cute. The quality is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Cate Hinton

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: Just slightly too small. My 2.5 year old uses it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Daycare bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for daycare for my little. The only downside is that they've started putting a full size folder in there but it's too big for the bag so you have to bend the corners to get it to fit in the bag and zip it up.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R

customer_reviews.title: Cute but useless!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my toddler. However, wouldn't recommend placing the lunchbox in the front. It causes the bag to weight my toddler down which looks extremely tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeyebrat3

customer_reviews.title: Toddler backpack
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 year old likes this backpack and didn’t want to take it off. It’s easy to quickly get on and off for preschool. It easily fits a change of clothes and shoes and has room for bringing home crafts and art.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K

customer_reviews.title: Cute pattern!
customer_reviews.text: Water bottle holder doesn’t have much flex so not all water bottles may fit but otherwise a very sturdy backpack. Love the flip on lunchbox feature and the spot to write your child’s name.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: We have almost the whole set; the backpack, lunch bag and nap mat. We love all of them. love that the backpack has a place for her water, and that it can clip to hold the lunch bag. This bag has held everything we've needed it to, so far. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pack!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It isn't meant to carry a ton of stuff but works great for our 17 month old's needs for school. If it was bigger, it would be way too big for the little ones to carry. It's very durable and made well. Love the side pocket for carrying art work home and paperwork to school! The hidden clips for carrying other bags like the yummie is very handy!
customer_reviews.author: dunesnstars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Just know that this is definitely a toddler size backpack. If your child uses a standard folder for work or correspondence with school. It will not fit in here. We love this and have another pattern for our son. They work exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Deepink

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is perfect for my 1 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for my 1 1/2 year old. She loves to wear it and I can fit all her stuff for daycare 1 blanket, 1 crib sheet, sippy cup and I fold her art after and stick it on the side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Mirna

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack for my two- and three-year-old, respectively, and they love it! It's big enough for folders, lunch boxes, and blankies -- but small enough for a toddler to carry. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Such a sweet backpack for my granddaughter’s first preschool experience. I wish I had bought the lunch kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Cute bagpack
customer_reviews.text: Looks well made. At first my 1.6 yo wasnt too of a fan but he wears it now wjthout a problem.
customer_reviews.author: PMachin

customer_reviews.title: Great first backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is adorable, I also got the matching lunch box that attaches to the bag. My daughter loves it. Great first backpack for my 18 month old!
customer_reviews.author: Brigham-Egbert

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it to everyone who's children go to day care ...
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten so many comments on this Packie! I recommend it to everyone who's children go to day care cause its perfect for them and it holds their art work... HOW CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Skydoll

customer_reviews.title: I honestly didn't realize the word "packie" was on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't realize the word "packie" was on the front. Was planning to out my daughters name on the bag and that would look weird now. Will use it for awhile since I bought the matching mat also. Otherwise it is decent. Nothing special but ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ash and Chris Brishke

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little backpack! It fits my preschooler perfectly, and I love the little side pocket to roll up his art work to bring home.
customer_reviews.author: MissLC86

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is precious! It’s a little big for my one year old to wear yet, but it’s adorable and I can tell it will be very durable. Love the little surprise chalkboard inside!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but too small for even pre k
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's waterproof, unfortunately it's not usable for school because of its size (too small, school requires a folder that holds weekly updates and such) but we found a skinny water bottle to fit in the holder so it's worked well on getaway trips!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this back pack
customer_reviews.text: Love this back pack. It fits my two year olds change of clothes, meds, and an extra diaper in case she has an accident. Her sippy cup fits in the side cylinder pocket as well. She loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: William R Willard

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this backpack is good, and my kids like it
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this backpack is good, and my kids like it, but the shoulder straps are a little wide for a toddler, and I personally think its ridiculous that they make you purchase the pencil bag separately.
customer_reviews.author: 30somethingShopperMom

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack for my daughter ! It’s big enough to fit a folder and papers and can hold her drawings on the outside! It also has a cup holder ! And you can connect the lunch bag to it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Abrego

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for 3 year old. Soft with easy zipper to open himself
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Well made. Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2.5 yr old! Love the art pouch and that it snaps to the lunch bags.
customer_reviews.author: c4TXangel

customer_reviews.title: Great for daycare!
customer_reviews.text: We love this backpack! It’s great for sending items for daycare. We use it around town too. The paper tube in the side is great for artwork, but we use it for sending an extra bottle of water with our daughter too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: Love it for transporting his bottles and bedding for daycare. Am excited to buy all the matching items as he gets older!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality backpack for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Our little loves it and refused to take it off when we opened the box up! Nice size - wearable from 18 mo thru toddler years. We plan to use this for travel and daycare. Love the sleeve for paperwork/artwork.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little backpack. Only wish the cup holder in the side were a little bigger as it doesn’t fit our cup.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.author: Mmmmkayla

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 3 year old. Enough space for her extra pair of clothes and the material is durable and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but to small for my four year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but to small for my four year old. We like to put his lunch bag inside the backpack to make it easier for him to carry. This one will fit his lunch bag, but not without his extra change of clothing falling out. Also, I like the idea of the tube for art work, but we really need a place to put his water bottle. His cup (Thermos Funtainer) would just get stuck in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: LaShuna Early

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I originally planned on purchasing a mini back pack from pottery barn kids but was unimpressed with their patterns. This pattern is unique and the backpack is wonderful

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE Urban Infant!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th time purchasing the Urban Infant Toddler Backpacks. We also own the coordinating lunchboxes and nap mats too. The products are great! All the kids have their own style so I love the fun patterns. I recommend to everyone if you’re looking for something fun & unique.

customer_reviews.title: Great little backpack for a preschooler!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this backpack for my 3 year old son. I love it and so does he, it was exactly what I was looking for. It's not too big or small for his size. The quality is very nice and you can wipe it clean if it gets dirty. Also the silo on the backpack is handy for art work that he brings home.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Urban Infant Packie Toddler / Preschool Packie Backpack - Poppies
product_meta.description: Color:PoppiesOur Packie backpack is lightweight and sturdy – ready for a toddler to tackle a day at preschool or a family trip! Constructed with a waterproof outer laminated material, kids love the fun patterns and parents love the ease of care. The size is suitable for children ages 2 – 6. Features a patented vertical tube to roll and transport your child’s art, an expandable mesh beverage holder, an interior zippered compartment, a “D” ring for attaching a toy, and unique hidden clips to add/attach a matching Urban Infant Yummie lunch bag, pencil pouch, or crayon wallet.
feature_bullets: YOUR TODDLER’S FIRST BACKPACK – for growing boys or girls headed off to preschool, our Packie backpack is designed for kids ages 2 - 6
EASY TO CLEAN – let your child be a child! Our laminated backpack is waterproof and easily wipes clean
TRANSPORTS ART AND SCHOOL PAPERS – patented vertical side tube houses your child’s artwork, teacher’s letters, and forms from school. Just roll up and tuck in
HELPS GET YOU OUT THE DOOR – perfect for a change of clothes, beach or weather gear, diapers or pull-ups, snacks, stuffed animals, and coloring books – pack it for school, a day trip, or a vacation
ALL SEASON GUARANTEE – rugged design and construction offers a full 12-month guarantee
